nodes.text: Ratak Raam'luk was a Vratix member of the Bounty Hunters' Guild. Raam'luk served as an Administrative/Personnel Officer, as well as holding a place on the Guild Council, sometime during the tenure of Cradossk as the Guild's Head.

During his time as an Administrative/Personnel Officer, Ratak had contributed to the Bounty Hunters Guild Handbook. Titled "Advantages of Guild Membership", Raam'luk's contribution to the handbook covered all benefits offered to bounty hunters whom held membership in the Guild.
